087/**
088 * The abstract class supporting {@code BukkitPlayer} and {@code SpongePlayer}.
089 */
090public abstract class PlotPlayer<P> implements CommandCaller, OfflinePlotPlayer, LocaleHolder {
091
092    private static final String NON_EXISTENT_CAPTION = "<red>PlotSquared does not recognize the caption: ";
093
094    private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger("PlotSquared/" + PlotPlayer.class.getSimpleName());
095
096    // Used to track debug mode
097    private static final Set<PlotPlayer<?>> debugModeEnabled =
098            Collections.synchronizedSet(new HashSet<>());
099
100    @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
101    private static final Map<Class<?>, PlotPlayerConverter> converters = new HashMap<>();
102    private final LockRepository lockRepository = new LockRepository();
103    private final PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager;
104    private final EventDispatcher eventDispatcher;
105    private final PermissionHandler permissionHandler;
106    private Map<String, byte[]> metaMap = new HashMap<>();
107    /**
108     * The metadata map.
109     */
110    private ConcurrentHashMap<String, Object> meta;
111    private int hash;
112    private Locale locale;
113    // Delayed initialisation
114    private PermissionProfile permissionProfile;
115
116    public PlotPlayer(
117            final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager, final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher,
118            final @NonNull PermissionHandler permissionHandler
119    ) {
120        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
121        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
122        this.permissionHandler = permissionHandler;
123    }
124
125    @SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
126    public static <T> PlotPlayer<T> from(final @NonNull T object) {
127        // fast path
128        if (converters.containsKey(object.getClass())) {
129            return converters.get(object.getClass()).convert(object);
130        }
131        // slow path, meant to only run once per object#getClass instance
132        Queue<Class<?>> toVisit = new ArrayDeque<>();
133        toVisit.add(object.getClass());
134        Class<?> current;
135        while ((current = toVisit.poll()) != null) {
136            PlotPlayerConverter converter = converters.get(current);
137            if (converter != null) {
138                if (current != object.getClass()) {
139                    // register shortcut for this sub type to avoid further loops
140                    converters.put(object.getClass(), converter);
141                    LOGGER.info("Registered {} as with converter for {}", object.getClass(), current);
142                }
143                return converter.convert(object);
144            }
145            // no converter found yet
146            if (current.getSuperclass() != null) {
147                toVisit.add(current.getSuperclass()); // add super class if available
148            }
149            toVisit.addAll(Arrays.asList(current.getInterfaces())); // add interfaces
150        }
151        throw new IllegalArgumentException(String
152                .format(
153                        "There is no registered PlotPlayer converter for type %s",
154                        object.getClass().getSimpleName()
155                ));
156    }
157
158    public static <T> void registerConverter(
159            final @NonNull Class<T> clazz,
160            final PlotPlayerConverter<T> converter
161    ) {
162        converters.put(clazz, converter);
163    }
164
165    public static Collection<PlotPlayer<?>> getDebugModePlayers() {
166        return Collections.unmodifiableCollection(debugModeEnabled);
167    }
168
169    public static Collection<PlotPlayer<?>> getDebugModePlayersInPlot(final @NonNull Plot plot) {
170        if (debugModeEnabled.isEmpty()) {
171            return Collections.emptyList();
172        }
173        final Collection<PlotPlayer<?>> players = new LinkedList<>();
174        for (final PlotPlayer<?> player : debugModeEnabled) {
175            if (player.getCurrentPlot().equals(plot)) {
176                players.add(player);
177            }
178        }
179        return players;
180    }
181
182    protected void setupPermissionProfile() {
183        this.permissionProfile = permissionHandler.getPermissionProfile(this).orElse(
184                NullPermissionProfile.INSTANCE);
185    }
186
187    @Override
188    public final boolean hasPermission(
189            final @Nullable String world,
190            final @NonNull String permission
191    ) {
192        return this.permissionProfile.hasPermission(world, permission);
193    }
194
195    @Override
196    public final boolean hasKeyedPermission(
197            final @Nullable String world,
198            final @NonNull String permission,
199            final @NonNull String key
200    ) {
201        return this.permissionProfile.hasKeyedPermission(world, permission, key);
202    }
203
204    public abstract Actor toActor();
205
206    public abstract P getPlatformPlayer();
207
208    /**
209     * Set some session only metadata for this player.
210     *
211     * @param key
212     * @param value
213     */
214    void setMeta(String key, Object value) {
215        if (value == null) {
216            deleteMeta(key);
217        } else {
218            if (this.meta == null) {
219                this.meta = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
220            }
221            this.meta.put(key, value);
222        }
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * Get the session metadata for a key.
227     *
228     * @param key the name of the metadata key
229     * @param <T> the object type to return
230     * @return the value assigned to the key or null if it does not exist
231     */
232    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
233    <T> T getMeta(String key) {
234        if (this.meta != null) {
235            return (T) this.meta.get(key);
236        }
237        return null;
238    }
239
240    <T> T getMeta(String key, T defaultValue) {
241        T meta = getMeta(key);
242        if (meta == null) {
243            return defaultValue;
244        }
245        return meta;
246    }
247
248    public ConcurrentHashMap<String, Object> getMeta() {
249        return meta;
250    }
251
252    /**
253     * Delete the metadata for a key.
254     * - metadata is session only
255     * - deleting other plugin's metadata may cause issues
256     *
257     * @param key
258     */
259    Object deleteMeta(String key) {
260        return this.meta == null ? null : this.meta.remove(key);
261    }
262
263    /**
264     * This player's name.
265     *
266     * @return the name of the player
267     */
268    @Override
269    public String toString() {
270        return getName();
271    }
272
273    /**
274     * Get this player's current plot.
275     *
276     * @return the plot the player is standing on or null if standing on a road or not in a {@link PlotArea}
277     */
278    public Plot getCurrentPlot() {
279        try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
280                     this.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
281            if (lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null) == null && !Settings.Enabled_Components.EVENTS) {
282                return this.getLocation().getPlot();
283            }
284            return lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null);
285        }
286    }
287
288    /**
289     * Get the total number of allowed plots
290     *
291     * @return number of allowed plots within the scope (globally, or in the player's current world as defined in the settings.yml)
292     */
293    public int getAllowedPlots() {
294        return Permissions.hasPermissionRange(this, "plots.plot", Settings.Limit.MAX_PLOTS);
295    }
296
297    /**
298     * Get the number of plots this player owns.
299     *
300     * @return number of plots within the scope (globally, or in the player's current world as defined in the settings.yml)
301     * @see #getPlotCount(String)
302     * @see #getPlots()
303     */
304    public int getPlotCount() {
305        if (!Settings.Limit.GLOBAL) {
306            return getPlotCount(getLocation().getWorldName());
307        }
308        final AtomicInteger count = new AtomicInteger(0);
309        final UUID uuid = getUUID();
310        this.plotAreaManager.forEachPlotArea(value -> {
311            if (!Settings.Done.COUNTS_TOWARDS_LIMIT) {
312                for (Plot plot : value.getPlotsAbs(uuid)) {
313                    if (!DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
314                        count.incrementAndGet();
315                    }
316                }
317            } else {
318                count.addAndGet(value.getPlotsAbs(uuid).size());
319            }
320        });
321        return count.get();
322    }
323
324    public int getClusterCount() {
325        if (!Settings.Limit.GLOBAL) {
326            return getClusterCount(getLocation().getWorldName());
327        }
328        final AtomicInteger count = new AtomicInteger(0);
329        this.plotAreaManager.forEachPlotArea(value -> {
330            for (PlotCluster cluster : value.getClusters()) {
331                if (cluster.isOwner(getUUID())) {
332                    count.incrementAndGet();
333                }
334            }
335        });
336        return count.get();
337    }
338
339    /**
340     * Get the number of plots this player owns in the world.
341     *
342     * @param world the name of the plotworld to check.
343     * @return plot count
344     */
345    public int getPlotCount(String world) {
346        UUID uuid = getUUID();
347        int count = 0;
348        for (PlotArea area : this.plotAreaManager.getPlotAreasSet(world)) {
349            if (!Settings.Done.COUNTS_TOWARDS_LIMIT) {
350                count +=
351                        area.getPlotsAbs(uuid).stream().filter(plot -> !DoneFlag.isDone(plot)).count();
352            } else {
353                count += area.getPlotsAbs(uuid).size();
354            }
355        }
356        return count;
357    }
358
359    public int getClusterCount(String world) {
360        int count = 0;
361        for (PlotArea area : this.plotAreaManager.getPlotAreasSet(world)) {
362            for (PlotCluster cluster : area.getClusters()) {
363                if (cluster.isOwner(getUUID())) {
364                    count++;
365                }
366            }
367        }
368        return count;
369    }
370
371    /**
372     * Get a {@link Set} of plots owned by this player.
373     *
374     * <p>
375     * Take a look at {@link PlotSquared} for more searching functions.
376     * See {@link #getPlotCount()} for the number of plots.
377     * </p>
378     *
379     * @return a {@link Set} of plots owned by the player
380     */
381    public Set<Plot> getPlots() {
382        return PlotQuery.newQuery().ownedBy(this).asSet();
383    }
384
385    /**
386     * Return the PlotArea this player is currently in, or null.
387     *
388     * @return Plot area the player is currently in, or {@code null}
389     */
390    public @Nullable PlotArea getPlotAreaAbs() {
391        return this.plotAreaManager.getPlotArea(getLocation());
392    }
393
394    public PlotArea getApplicablePlotArea() {
395        return this.plotAreaManager.getApplicablePlotArea(getLocation());
396    }
397
398    @Override
399    public @NonNull RequiredType getSuperCaller() {
400        return RequiredType.PLAYER;
401    }
402
403    /**
404     * Get this player's last recorded location or null if they don't any plot relevant location.
405     *
406     * @return The location
407     */
408    public @NonNull Location getLocation() {
409        Location location = getMeta("location");
410        if (location != null) {
411            return location;
412        }
413        return getLocationFull();
414    }

420    /**
421     * Get this player's full location (including yaw/pitch)
422     *
423     * @return location
424     */
425    public abstract Location getLocationFull();

429    /**
430     * Get this player's UUID.
431     * === !IMPORTANT ===<br>
432     * The UUID is dependent on the mode chosen in the settings.yml and may not be the same as Bukkit has
433     * (especially if using an old version of Bukkit that does not support UUIDs)
434     *
435     * @return UUID
436     */
437    @Override
438    public @NonNull
439    abstract UUID getUUID();
440
441    public boolean canTeleport(final @NonNull Location location) {
442        Preconditions.checkNotNull(location, "Specified location cannot be null");
443        final Location current = getLocationFull();
444        teleport(location);
445        boolean result = getLocation().equals(location);
446        teleport(current);
447        return result;
448    }
449
450    /**
451     * Teleport this player to a location.
452     *
453     * @param location the target location
454     */
455    public void teleport(Location location) {
456        teleport(location, TeleportCause.PLUGIN);
457    }
458
459    /**
460     * Teleport this player to a location.
461     *
462     * @param location the target location
463     * @param cause    the cause of the teleport
464     */
465    public abstract void teleport(Location location, TeleportCause cause);
466
467    /**
468     * Kick this player to a location
469     *
470     * @param location the target location
471     */
472    public void plotkick(Location location) {
473        setMeta("kick", true);
474        teleport(location, TeleportCause.KICK);
475        deleteMeta("kick");
476    }
477
478    /**
479     * Set this compass target.
480     *
481     * @param location the target location
482     */
483    public abstract void setCompassTarget(Location location);
484
485    /**
486     * Set player data that will persist restarts.
487     * - Please note that this is not intended to store large values
488     * - For session only data use meta
489     *
490     * @param key metadata key
491     */
492    public void setAttribute(String key) {
493        setPersistentMeta("attrib_" + key, new byte[]{(byte) 1});
494    }
495
496    /**
497     * Retrieves the attribute of this player.
498     *
499     * @param key metadata key
500     * @return the attribute will be either {@code true} or {@code false}
501     */
502    public boolean getAttribute(String key) {
503        if (!hasPersistentMeta("attrib_" + key)) {
504            return false;
505        }
506        return getPersistentMeta("attrib_" + key)[0] == 1;
507    }
508
509    /**
510     * Remove an attribute from a player.
511     *
512     * @param key metadata key
513     */
514    public void removeAttribute(String key) {
515        removePersistentMeta("attrib_" + key);
516    }
517

519     * Sets the local weather for this Player.

521     * @param weather the weather visible to the player

523    public abstract void setWeather(@NonNull PlotWeather weather);

526     * Get this player's gamemode.

530    public abstract @NonNull GameMode getGameMode();

533     * Set this player's gameMode.

537    public abstract void setGameMode(@NonNull GameMode gameMode);

540     * Set this player's local time (ticks).
541     *
542     * @param time the time visible to the player

544    public abstract void setTime(long time);

547     * Determines whether or not the player can fly.
548     *
549     * @return {@code true} if the player is allowed to fly
550     */
551    public abstract boolean getFlight();

554     * Sets whether or not this player can fly.
555     *

558    public abstract void setFlight(boolean fly);

561     * Play music at a location for this player.
562     *
563     * @param location where to play the music
564     * @param id       the record item id
565     */
566    public abstract void playMusic(@NonNull Location location, @NonNull ItemType id);
567
568    /**
569     * Check if this player is banned.
570     *
571     * @return {@code true} if the player is banned, {@code false} otherwise.
572     */
573    public abstract boolean isBanned();
574
575    /**
576     * Kick this player from the game.
577     *
578     * @param message the reason for the kick
579     */
580    public abstract void kick(String message);
581
582    public void refreshDebug() {
583        final boolean debug = this.getAttribute("debug");
584        if (debug && !debugModeEnabled.contains(this)) {
585            debugModeEnabled.add(this);
586        } else if (!debug) {
587            debugModeEnabled.remove(this);
588        }
589    }
590
591    /**
592     * Called when this player quits.
593     */
594    public void unregister() {
595        Plot plot = getCurrentPlot();
596        if (plot != null && Settings.Enabled_Components.PERSISTENT_META && plot
597                .getArea() instanceof SinglePlotArea) {
598            PlotId id = plot.getId();
599            int x = id.getX();
600            int z = id.getY();
601            ByteBuffer buffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(13);
602            buffer.putShort((short) x);
603            buffer.putShort((short) z);
604            Location location = getLocation();
605            buffer.putInt(location.getX());
606            buffer.put((byte) location.getY());
607            buffer.putInt(location.getZ());
608            setPersistentMeta("quitLoc", buffer.array());
609        } else if (hasPersistentMeta("quitLoc")) {
610            removePersistentMeta("quitLoc");
611        }
612        if (plot != null) {
613            this.eventDispatcher.callLeave(this, plot);
614        }
615        if (Settings.Enabled_Components.BAN_DELETER && isBanned()) {
616            for (Plot owned : getPlots()) {
617                owned.getPlotModificationManager().deletePlot(null, null);
618                LOGGER.info("Plot {} was deleted + cleared due to {} getting banned", owned.getId(), getName());
619            }
620        }
621        if (PlotSquared.platform().expireManager() != null) {
622            PlotSquared.platform().expireManager().storeDate(getUUID(), System.currentTimeMillis());
623        }
624        PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().removePlayer(this);
625        PlotSquared.platform().unregister(this);
626
627        debugModeEnabled.remove(this);
628    }
629
630    /**
631     * Get the amount of clusters this player owns in the specific world.
632     *
633     * @param world world
634     * @return number of clusters owned
635     */
636    public int getPlayerClusterCount(String world) {
637        return PlotSquared.get().getClusters(world).stream()
638                .filter(cluster -> getUUID().equals(cluster.owner)).mapToInt(PlotCluster::getArea)
639                .sum();
640    }
641
642    /**
643     * Get the amount of clusters this player owns.
644     *
645     * @return the number of clusters this player owns
646     */
647    public int getPlayerClusterCount() {
648        final AtomicInteger count = new AtomicInteger();
649        this.plotAreaManager.forEachPlotArea(value -> count.addAndGet(value.getClusters().size()));
650        return count.get();
651    }
652
653    /**
654     * Return a {@code Set} of all plots this player owns in a certain world.
655     *
656     * @param world the world to retrieve plots from
657     * @return a {@code Set} of plots this player owns in the provided world
658     */
659    public Set<Plot> getPlots(String world) {
660        return PlotQuery.newQuery().inWorld(world).ownedBy(getUUID()).asSet();
661    }
662
663    public void populatePersistentMetaMap() {
664        if (Settings.Enabled_Components.PERSISTENT_META) {
665            DBFunc.getPersistentMeta(getUUID(), new RunnableVal<>() {
666                @Override
667                public void run(Map<String, byte[]> value) {
668                    try {
669                        PlotPlayer.this.metaMap = value;
670                        if (value.isEmpty()) {
671                            return;
672                        }
673
674                        if (PlotPlayer.this.getAttribute("debug")) {
675                            debugModeEnabled.add(PlotPlayer.this);
676                        }
677
678                        if (!Settings.Teleport.ON_LOGIN) {
679                            return;
680                        }
681                        PlotAreaManager manager = PlotPlayer.this.plotAreaManager;
682
683                        if (!(manager instanceof SinglePlotAreaManager)) {
684                            return;
685                        }
686                        PlotArea area = ((SinglePlotAreaManager) manager).getArea();
687                        byte[] arr = PlotPlayer.this.getPersistentMeta("quitLoc");
688                        if (arr == null) {
689                            return;
690                        }
691                        removePersistentMeta("quitLoc");
692
693                        if (!getMeta("teleportOnLogin", true)) {
694                            return;
695                        }
696                        ByteBuffer quitWorld = ByteBuffer.wrap(arr);
697                        final int plotX = quitWorld.getShort();
698                        final int plotZ = quitWorld.getShort();
699                        PlotId id = PlotId.of(plotX, plotZ);
700                        int x = quitWorld.getInt();
701                        int y = quitWorld.get() & 0xFF;
702                        int z = quitWorld.getInt();
703                        Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(id);
704
705                        if (plot == null) {
706                            return;
707                        }
708
709                        final Location location = Location.at(plot.getWorldName(), x, y, z);
710                        if (plot.isLoaded()) {
711                            TaskManager.runTask(() -> {
712                                if (getMeta("teleportOnLogin", true)) {
713                                    teleport(location, TeleportCause.LOGIN);
714                                    sendMessage(
715                                            TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleported_to_plot"));
716                                }
717                            });
718                        } else if (!PlotSquared.get().isMainThread(Thread.currentThread())) {
719                            if (getMeta("teleportOnLogin", true)) {
720                                plot.teleportPlayer(
721                                        PlotPlayer.this,
722                                        result -> TaskManager.runTask(() -> {
723                                            if (getMeta("teleportOnLogin", true)) {
724                                                if (plot.isLoaded()) {
725                                                    teleport(location, TeleportCause.LOGIN);
726                                                    sendMessage(TranslatableCaption
727                                                            .of("teleport.teleported_to_plot"));
728                                                }
729                                            }
730                                        })
731                                );
732                            }
733                        }
734                    } catch (Throwable e) {
735                        e.printStackTrace();
736                    }
737                }
738            });
739        }
740    }
741
742    byte[] getPersistentMeta(String key) {
743        return this.metaMap.get(key);
744    }
745
746    Object removePersistentMeta(String key) {
747        final Object old = this.metaMap.remove(key);
748        if (Settings.Enabled_Components.PERSISTENT_META) {
749            DBFunc.removePersistentMeta(getUUID(), key);
750        }
751        return old;
752    }
753
754    /**
755     * Access keyed persistent meta data for this player. This returns a meta data
756     * access instance, that MUST be closed. It is meant to be used with try-with-resources,
757     * like such:
758     * <pre>{@code
759     * try (final MetaDataAccess<Integer> access = player.accessPersistentMetaData(PlayerMetaKeys.GRANTS)) {
760     *     int grants = access.get();
761     *     access.set(grants + 1);
762     * }
763     * }</pre>
764     *
765     * @param key Meta data key
766     * @param <T> Meta data type
767     * @return Meta data access. MUST be closed after being used
768     */
769    public @NonNull <T> MetaDataAccess<T> accessPersistentMetaData(final @NonNull MetaDataKey<T> key) {
770        return new PersistentMetaDataAccess<>(this, key, this.lockRepository.lock(key.getLockKey()));
771    }
772
773    /**
774     * Access keyed temporary meta data for this player. This returns a meta data
775     * access instance, that MUST be closed. It is meant to be used with try-with-resources,
776     * like such:
777     * <pre>{@code
778     * try (final MetaDataAccess<Integer> access = player.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaKeys.GRANTS)) {
779     *     int grants = access.get();
780     *     access.set(grants + 1);
781     * }
782     * }</pre>
783     *
784     * @param key Meta data key
785     * @param <T> Meta data type
786     * @return Meta data access. MUST be closed after being used
787     */
788    public @NonNull <T> MetaDataAccess<T> accessTemporaryMetaData(final @NonNull MetaDataKey<T> key) {
789        return new TemporaryMetaDataAccess<>(this, key, this.lockRepository.lock(key.getLockKey()));
790    }
791
792    <T> void setPersistentMeta(
793            final @NonNull MetaDataKey<T> key,
794            final @NonNull T value
795    ) {
796        if (key.getType().getRawType().equals(Integer.class)) {
797            this.setPersistentMeta(key.toString(), Ints.toByteArray((int) (Object) value));
798        } else if (key.getType().getRawType().equals(Boolean.class)) {
799            this.setPersistentMeta(key.toString(), ByteArrayUtilities.booleanToBytes((boolean) (Object) value));
800        } else {
801            throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unknown meta data type '%s'", key.getType()));
802        }
803    }
804
805    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
806    @Nullable <T> T getPersistentMeta(final @NonNull MetaDataKey<T> key) {
807        final byte[] value = this.getPersistentMeta(key.toString());
808        if (value == null) {
809            return null;
810        }
811        final Object returnValue;
812        if (key.getType().getRawType().equals(Integer.class)) {
813            returnValue = Ints.fromByteArray(value);
814        } else if (key.getType().getRawType().equals(Boolean.class)) {
815            returnValue = ByteArrayUtilities.bytesToBoolean(value);
816        } else {
817            throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unknown meta data type '%s'", key.getType()));
818        }
819        return (T) returnValue;
820    }
821
822    void setPersistentMeta(String key, byte[] value) {
823        boolean delete = hasPersistentMeta(key);
824        this.metaMap.put(key, value);
825        if (Settings.Enabled_Components.PERSISTENT_META) {
826            DBFunc.addPersistentMeta(getUUID(), key, value, delete);
827        }
828    }
829
830    /**
831     * Send a title to the player that fades in, in 10 ticks, stays for 50 ticks and fades
832     * out in 20 ticks
833     *
834     * @param title        Title text
835     * @param subtitle     Subtitle text
836     * @param replacements Variable replacements
837     */
838    public void sendTitle(
839            final @NonNull Caption title, final @NonNull Caption subtitle,
840            final @NonNull TagResolver... replacements
841    ) {
842        sendTitle(
843                title,
844                subtitle,
845                Settings.Titles.TITLES_FADE_IN,
846                Settings.Titles.TITLES_STAY,
847                Settings.Titles.TITLES_FADE_OUT,
848                replacements
849        );
850    }
851
852    /**
853     * Send a title to the player
854     *
855     * @param title        Title
856     * @param subtitle     Subtitle
857     * @param fadeIn       Fade in time (in ticks)
858     * @param stay         The title stays for (in ticks)
859     * @param fadeOut      Fade out time (in ticks)
860     * @param replacements Variable replacements
861     */
862    public void sendTitle(
863            final @NonNull Caption title, final @NonNull Caption subtitle,
864            final int fadeIn, final int stay, final int fadeOut,
865            final @NonNull TagResolver... replacements
866    ) {
867        final Component titleComponent = MiniMessage.miniMessage().deserialize(title.getComponent(this), replacements);
868        final Component subtitleComponent =
869                MiniMessage.miniMessage().deserialize(subtitle.getComponent(this), replacements);
870        final Title.Times times = Title.Times.of(
871                Duration.of(Settings.Titles.TITLES_FADE_IN * 50L, ChronoUnit.MILLIS),
872                Duration.of(Settings.Titles.TITLES_STAY * 50L, ChronoUnit.MILLIS),
873                Duration.of(Settings.Titles.TITLES_FADE_OUT * 50L, ChronoUnit.MILLIS)
874        );
875        getAudience().showTitle(Title
876                .title(titleComponent, subtitleComponent, times));
877    }
878
879    /**
880     * Method designed to send an ActionBar to a player.
881     *
882     * @param caption      Caption
883     * @param replacements Variable replacements
884     */
885    public void sendActionBar(
886            final @NonNull Caption caption,
887            final @NonNull TagResolver... replacements
888    ) {
889        String message;
890        try {
891            message = caption.getComponent(this);
892        } catch (final CaptionMap.NoSuchCaptionException exception) {
893            // This sends feedback to the player
894            message = NON_EXISTENT_CAPTION + ((TranslatableCaption) caption).getKey();
895            // And this also prints it to the console
896            exception.printStackTrace();
897        }
898        if (message.isEmpty()) {
899            return;
900        }
901        // Replace placeholders, etc
902        message = CaptionUtility.format(this, message)
903                .replace('\u2010', '%').replace('\u2020', '&').replace('\u2030', '&')
904                .replace("<prefix>", TranslatableCaption.of("core.prefix").getComponent(this));
905
906
907        final Component component = MiniMessage.miniMessage().deserialize(message, replacements);
908        getAudience().sendActionBar(component);
909    }
910
911    @Override
912    public void sendMessage(
913            final @NonNull Caption caption,
914            final @NonNull TagResolver... replacements
915    ) {
916        String message;
917        try {
918            message = caption.getComponent(this);
919        } catch (final CaptionMap.NoSuchCaptionException exception) {
920            // This sends feedback to the player
921            message = NON_EXISTENT_CAPTION + ((TranslatableCaption) caption).getKey();
922            // And this also prints it to the console
923            exception.printStackTrace();
924        }
925        if (message.isEmpty()) {
926            return;
927        }
928        // Replace placeholders, etc
929        message = CaptionUtility.format(this, message)
930                .replace('\u2010', '%').replace('\u2020', '&').replace('\u2030', '&')
931                .replace("<prefix>", TranslatableCaption.of("core.prefix").getComponent(this));
932        // Parse the message
933        final Component component = MiniMessage.miniMessage().deserialize(message, replacements);
934        if (!Objects.equal(component, this.getMeta("lastMessage"))
935                || System.currentTimeMillis() - this.<Long>getMeta("lastMessageTime") > 5000) {
936            setMeta("lastMessage", component);
937            setMeta("lastMessageTime", System.currentTimeMillis());
938            getAudience().sendMessage(component);
939        }
940    }
941
942    // Redefine from PermissionHolder as it's required from CommandCaller
943    @Override
944    public boolean hasPermission(@NonNull String permission) {
945        return hasPermission(null, permission);
946    }
947
948    boolean hasPersistentMeta(String key) {
949        return this.metaMap.containsKey(key);
950    }
951
952    /**
953     * Check if the player is able to see the other player.
954     * This does not mean that the other player is in line of sight of the player,
955     * but rather that the player is permitted to see the other player.
956     *
957     * @param other Other player
958     * @return {@code true} if the player is able to see the other player, {@code false} if not
959     */
960    public abstract boolean canSee(PlotPlayer<?> other);
961
962    public abstract void stopSpectating();
963
964    public boolean hasDebugMode() {
965        return this.getAttribute("debug");
966    }
967
968    @NonNull
969    @Override
970    public Locale getLocale() {
971        if (this.locale == null) {
972            this.locale = Locale.forLanguageTag(Settings.Enabled_Components.DEFAULT_LOCALE);
973        }
974        return this.locale;
975    }
976
977    @Override
978    public void setLocale(final @NonNull Locale locale) {
979        if (!PlotSquared.get().getCaptionMap(TranslatableCaption.DEFAULT_NAMESPACE).supportsLocale(locale)) {
980            this.locale = Locale.forLanguageTag(Settings.Enabled_Components.DEFAULT_LOCALE);
981        } else {
982            this.locale = locale;
983        }
984    }
985
986    @Override
987    public int hashCode() {
988        if (this.hash == 0 || this.hash == 485) {
989            this.hash = 485 + this.getUUID().hashCode();
990        }
991        return this.hash;
992    }
993
994    @Override
995    public boolean equals(final Object obj) {
996        if (!(obj instanceof final PlotPlayer<?> other)) {
997            return false;
998        }
999        return this.getUUID().equals(other.getUUID());
1000    }
1001
1002    /**
1003     * Get the {@link Audience} that represents this plot player
1004     *
1005     * @return Player audience
1006     */
1007    public @NonNull
1008    abstract Audience getAudience();
1009
1010    /**
1011     * Get this player's {@link LockRepository}
1012     *
1013     * @return Lock repository instance
1014     */
1015    public @NonNull LockRepository getLockRepository() {
1016        return this.lockRepository;
1017    }

1020     * Removes any effects present of the given type.
1021     *
1022     * @param name the name of the type to remove
1023     * @since 6.10.0
1024     */
1025    public abstract void removeEffect(@NonNull String name);

1028    public interface PlotPlayerConverter<BaseObject> {
1029
1030        PlotPlayer<?> convert(BaseObject object);
1031
1032    }
